subject: nroff errors in 3.0.35a version of smb.conf.5
body:
Hi Jerry,

Did you change your DocBook build system for the 3.0.25a release? On  
Darwin, most of the special characters are displayed as XMl entities,  
eg:

        Any line  beginning  with  a  semicolon  (“;”)   
or  a  hash
        (“#”)  character  is  ignored, as are lines  
containing only
        whitespace.


--
James Peach | jpeach@samba.org
